item.title: 508 Dwarf Remains
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Anyone care to help out a bro, I am having trouble with player not able to drop nulls and dwarf remains. They do the ::empty command but it still doesnt go away. In all character i saw that the items on inventory are written as “item0:(item id)” to “item28:(item id)” since there are 28 inv spaces.
How can i make a command that will result in deletion of all inventory space.
The current empty comamnd i have is :

if(cmd[0].equals("empty")) { for (int y = 0; y < 28; y++) for(int x = 0; x < 15000; x++) Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, x, y, 1000000000); }

Read full topic
